summary: The story of Vito Russo, founding father of the gay liberation movement, author of "The Celluloid Closet," and vociferous AIDS activist in the 1980s.
cast: Phyllis Antonellis|George Bancroft|Richard Barrios|Edmund Bergler|Richard Berkowitz|Lenny Bloom|Jay Blotcher|Malcolm Boyd|Stephen Boyd|Joseph Brewer|Lee Brewster|Tom Brokaw|Billie Burke|Marcus A.
